```{r func_list_img_files}
list_img_files <- function (path = getwd()) {
  
  files <- list.files(path = path, include.dirs = TRUE) %>%
    as.data.frame %>% 
    dplyr::filter(grepl(".eps$|.bmp$|.gif$|.jpg$|.png$|.pdf$", .))
  
  colnames(files) <- c("Filename")
  files$Filename <- as.character(files$Filename)

  return(files)
}
```

```{r}
file.path <- getwd()
filename <- list_img_files(path = getwd())
```
